verses.verse: וַיְצַ֞ו <S%H6680><s%> And he commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> as much as עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בֵּיתוֹ֮ <S%H1004><s%> the steward of his house לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying מַלֵּ֞א <S%H4390><s%> Fill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַמְתְּחֹ֤ת <S%H572><s%> sacks הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> every man's אֹ֔כֶל <S%H400><s%> [with] food כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> as they יוּכְל֖וּן <S%H3201><s%> they can שְׂאֵ֑ת <S%H5375><s%> carry וְשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> and put כֶּֽסֶף־ <S%H3701><s%> money אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> each בְּפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> mouth אַמְתַּחְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H572><s%> in his sack's

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּבִיעִ֞י <S%H1375><s%> my cup גְּבִ֣יעַ <S%H1375><s%> cup הַכֶּ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> the silver תָּשִׂים֙ <S%H7760><s%> And put בְּפִי֙ <S%H6310><s%> mouth אַמְתַּ֣חַת <S%H572><s%> in the sack's הַקָּטֹ֔ן <S%H6996><s%> of the youngest וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money שִׁבְר֑וֹ <S%H7668><s%> and his corn וַיַּ֕עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did כִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the word יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> that Joseph אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> had spoken

הַבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> As soon as the morning א֑וֹר <S%H216><s%> light וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H582><s%> the men שֻׁלְּח֔וּ <S%H7971><s%> were sent away הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> with וַחֲמֹרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H2543><s%> they and their asses

הֵ֠ם <S%H1992><s%> They יָֽצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> [And] when they were gone out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִיר֮ <S%H5892><s%> of the city לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> were not הִרְחִיקוּ֒ <S%H7368><s%> [and] not [yet] far off וְיוֹסֵ֤ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> said לַֽאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> unto his steward ק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> Up רְדֹ֖ף <S%H7291><s%> follow אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H376><s%> the men וְהִשַּׂגְתָּם֙ <S%H5381><s%> and when thou dost overtake וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> them say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to לָ֛מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why שִׁלַּמְתֶּ֥ם <S%H7999><s%> unto them Wherefore have ye rewarded רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> evil תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash טוֹבָֽה׃ <S%H2896><s%> good

הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> is not זֶ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִשְׁתֶּ֤ה <S%H8354><s%> drinketh אֲדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> [Is] not this [it] in which my lord בּ֔וֹ וְה֕וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נַחֵ֥שׁ <S%H5172><s%> and whereby indeed יְנַחֵ֖שׁ <S%H5172><s%> he divineth בּ֑וֹ הֲרֵעֹתֶ֖ם <S%H7489><s%> ? ye have done evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> in so doing

וַֽיַּשִּׂגֵ֑ם <S%H5381><s%> And he overtook וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> them and he spake אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> unto them these same

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him לָ֚מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why יְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> unto him Wherefore saith אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> my lord כַּדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> according to this thing הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another חָלִ֙ילָה֙ <S%H2486><s%> be far לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> that thy servants מֵעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> should do כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> A thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> such

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold כֶּ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Behold the money אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which מָצָ֙אנוּ֙ <S%H4672><s%> which we found בְּפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> mouths אַמְתְּחֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H572><s%> in our sacks' הֱשִׁיבֹ֥נוּ <S%H7725><s%> we brought again אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto thee out of the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וְאֵ֗יךְ <S%H349><s%> How נִגְנֹב֙ <S%H1589><s%> how then should we steal מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אֲדֹנֶ֔יךָ <S%H113><s%> out of thy lord's כֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> gold

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whomever יִמָּצֵ֥א <S%H4672><s%> it be found אִתּ֛וֹ <S%H854><s%> for מֵעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> With whomsoever of thy servants וָמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> both let him die וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֲנַ֕חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves נִֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לַֽאדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> and we also will be my lord's לַעֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> bondmen

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also עַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> Now כְדִבְרֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1697><s%> to your words כֶּן־ <S%H3651><s%> after that ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom יִמָּצֵ֤א <S%H4672><s%> he with whom it is found אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> for יִהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִּ֣י עָ֔בֶד <S%H5650><s%> shall be my servant וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you תִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become נְקִיִּֽם׃ <S%H5355><s%> and ye shall be blameless

וַֽיְמַהֲר֗וּ <S%H4116><s%> Then they speedily וַיּוֹרִ֛דוּ <S%H3381><s%> took down אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַמְתַּחְתּ֖וֹ <S%H572><s%> his sack אָ֑רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the ground וַֽיִּפְתְּח֖וּ <S%H6605><s%> and opened אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man אַמְתַּחְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H572><s%> his sack

וַיְחַפֵּ֕שׂ <S%H2664><s%> And he searched בַּגָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> at the eldest הֵחֵ֔ל <S%H2490><s%> [and] began וּבַקָּטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> at the youngest כִּלָּ֑ה <S%H3615><s%> and left וַיִּמָּצֵא֙ <S%H4672><s%> was found הַגָּבִ֔יעַ <S%H1375><s%> and the cup בְּאַמְתַּ֖חַת <S%H572><s%> sack בִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> in Benjamin's

וַֽיִּקְרְע֖וּ <S%H7167><s%> Then they rent שִׂמְלֹתָ֑ם <S%H8071><s%> their clothes וַֽיַּעֲמֹס֙ <S%H6006><s%> and laded אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and חֲמֹר֔וֹ <S%H2543><s%> his ass וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> and returned הָעִֽירָה׃ <S%H5892><s%> to the city

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> came יְהוּדָ֤ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah וְאֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> and his brethren בֵּ֣יתָה <S%H1004><s%> house יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> to Joseph's וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> was still שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> for he [was] yet there and they fell לְפָנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> before him אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> on the ground

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶם֙ יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What הַמַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> unto them What deed הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> is this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עֲשִׂיתֶ֑ם <S%H6213><s%> [is] this that ye have done הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not יְדַעְתֶּ֔ם <S%H3045><s%> ? wot ye כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> can נַחֵ֧שׁ <S%H5172><s%> as I can certainly יְנַחֵ֛שׁ <S%H5172><s%> divine אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> not that such a man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that כָּמֹֽנִי׃ <S%H3644><s%> such

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What נֹּאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> What shall we say לַֽאדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> behold we [are] my lord's מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What נְּדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> answer וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What נִּצְטַדָּ֑ק <S%H6663><s%> ? or how shall we clear ourselves הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> ? God מָצָא֙ <S%H4672><s%> hath found out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servants הִנֶּנּ֤וּ <S%H2005><s%> behold עֲבָדִים֙ <S%H5650><s%> servants לַֽאדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> are my lord's גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both we and [he] also אֲנַ֕חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we גַּ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> both אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whose נִמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> is found הַגָּבִ֖יעַ <S%H1375><s%> the cup בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> possession

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said חָלִ֣ילָה <S%H2486><s%> God forbid לִּ֔י מֵעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that I should do זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> so הָאִ֡ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [but] the man אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whose נִמְצָ֨א <S%H4672><s%> is found הַגָּבִ֜יעַ <S%H1375><s%> the cup בְּיָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in whose hand ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִּ֣י עָ֔בֶד <S%H5650><s%> he shall be my servant וְאַתֶּ֕ם <S%H859><s%> you עֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> and as for you get you up לְשָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲבִיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> unto your father פ

וַיִּגַּ֨שׁ <S%H5066><s%> came near אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> then יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> Then Judah וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <S%H559><s%> unto him and said בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> Oh אֲדֹנִי֒ <S%H113><s%> my lord יְדַבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> I pray thee speak נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> please עַבְדְּךָ֤ <S%H5650><s%> let thy servant דָבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> a word בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> ears אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> in my lord's וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יִ֥חַר <S%H2734><s%> burn אַפְּךָ֖ <S%H639><s%> and let not thine anger בְּעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> against thy servant כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for כָמ֖וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> are equal כְּפַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> for thou [art] even as Pharaoh

אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> My lord שָׁאַ֔ל <S%H7592><s%> asked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> his servants לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הֲיֵשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> Have לָכֶ֥ם אָ֖ב <S%H1><s%> ye a father אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or אָֽח׃ <S%H251><s%> We

וַנֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And we said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> unto my lord יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> We have לָ֙נוּ֙ אָ֣ב <S%H1><s%> a father זָקֵ֔ן <S%H2205><s%> an old man וְיֶ֥לֶד <S%H3206><s%> and a child זְקֻנִ֖ים <S%H2208><s%> of his old age קָטָ֑ן <S%H6996><s%> a little one וְאָחִ֨יו <S%H251><s%> and his brother מֵ֜ת <S%H4191><s%> is dead וַיִּוָּתֵ֨ר <S%H3498><s%> and he alone is left ה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְבַדּ֛וֹ <S%H905><s%> alone לְאִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> of his mother וְאָבִ֥יו <S%H1><s%> and his father אֲהֵבֽוֹ׃ <S%H157><s%> loveth

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And thou saidst אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servants הוֹרִדֻ֖הוּ <S%H3381><s%> Bring him down אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me וְאָשִׂ֥ימָה <S%H7760><s%> unto me that I may set עֵינִ֖י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> we

וַנֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And we said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> unto my lord לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> cannot הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> The lad לַעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> leave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְעָזַ֥ב <S%H5800><s%> for [if] he should leave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> his father וָמֵֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> [his father] would die

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And thou saidst אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servants אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Except לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Except יֵרֵ֛ד <S%H3381><s%> come down אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> brother הַקָּטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> your youngest אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תֹסִפ֖וּן <S%H3254><s%> add לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> see פָּנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> my face

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when עָלִ֔ינוּ <S%H5927><s%> And it came to pass when we came up אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַבְדְּךָ֖ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servant אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> my father וַנַּ֨גֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> we told ל֔וֹ אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> him the words אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> of my lord
וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אָבִ֑ינוּ <S%H1><s%> And our father שֻׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> Go again שִׁבְרוּ־ <S%H7666><s%> [and] buy לָ֥נוּ מְעַט־ <S%H4592><s%> us a little אֹֽכֶל׃ <S%H400><s%> food

וַנֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And we said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not נוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> We cannot לָרֶ֑דֶת <S%H3381><s%> go down אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יֵשׁ֩ <S%H3426><s%> be אָחִ֨ינוּ <S%H251><s%> brother הַקָּטֹ֤ן <S%H6996><s%> if our youngest אִתָּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H854><s%> for וְיָרַ֔דְנוּ <S%H3381><s%> with us then will we go down כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not נוּכַ֗ל <S%H3201><s%> for we may לִרְאוֹת֙ <S%H7200><s%> not see פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> face הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man's וְאָחִ֥ינוּ <S%H251><s%> brother הַקָּטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> our youngest אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <S%H369><s%> except אִתָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said עַבְדְּךָ֥ <S%H5650><s%> And thy servant אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> my father אֵלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H413><s%> about אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> You יְדַעְתֶּ֔ם <S%H3045><s%> unto us Ye know כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> me two יָֽלְדָה־ <S%H3205><s%> bare לִּ֥י אִשְׁתִּֽי׃ <S%H802><s%> that my wife

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> went out הָֽאֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> And the one מֵֽאִתִּ֔י <S%H853><s%> וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> from me and I said אַ֖ךְ <S%H389><s%> Surely טָרֹ֣ף <S%H2963><s%> Surely טֹרָ֑ף <S%H2963><s%> he is torn in pieces וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not רְאִיתִ֖יו <S%H7200><s%> and I saw him עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> not הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> not since

וּלְקַחְתֶּ֧ם <S%H3947><s%> And if ye take גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> this מֵעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> this also from פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> me וְקָרָ֣הוּ <S%H7136><s%> befall him אָס֑וֹן <S%H611><s%> and mischief וְהֽוֹרַדְתֶּ֧ם <S%H3381><s%> ye shall bring down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׂיבָתִ֛י <S%H7872><s%> my gray hairs בְּרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> with sorrow שְׁאֹֽלָה׃ <S%H7585><s%> to the grave

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now כְּבֹאִי֙ <S%H935><s%> Now therefore when I come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַבְדְּךָ֣ <S%H5650><s%> to thy servant אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> my father וְהַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> and the lad אֵינֶ֣נּוּ <S%H369><s%> else אִתָּ֑נוּ <S%H854><s%> since וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H5315><s%> [be] not with us seeing that his life קְשׁוּרָ֥ה <S%H7194><s%> is bound up בְנַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> in the lad's life

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִּרְאוֹת֛וֹ <S%H7200><s%> It shall come to pass when he seeth כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> that הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> that the lad וָמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> [is] not [with us] that he will die וְהוֹרִ֨ידוּ <S%H3381><s%> shall bring down עֲבָדֶ֜יךָ <S%H5650><s%> and thy servants אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׂיבַ֨ת <S%H7872><s%> the gray hairs עַבְדְּךָ֥ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servant אָבִ֛ינוּ <S%H1><s%> our father בְּיָג֖וֹן <S%H3015><s%> with sorrow שְׁאֹֽלָה׃ <S%H7585><s%> to the grave

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For עַבְדְּךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> For thy servant עָרַ֣ב <S%H6148><s%> became surety אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> for the lad מֵעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> unto אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> my father לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not אֲבִיאֶ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> If I bring אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you וְחָטָ֥אתִי <S%H2398><s%> him not unto thee then I shall bear the blame לְאָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> to my father כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> for ever

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יֵֽשֶׁב־ <S%H3427><s%> abide נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> please עַבְדְּךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> Now therefore I pray thee let thy servant תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> instead הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> instead of the lad עֶ֖בֶד <S%H5650><s%> a bondman לַֽאדֹנִ֑י <S%H113><s%> to my lord וְהַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> and let the lad יַ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> go up עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֶחָֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> with his brethren

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אֵיךְ֙ <S%H349><s%> For how אֶֽעֱלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> shall I go up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> to my father וְהַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> and the lad אֵינֶ֣נּוּ <S%H369><s%> else אִתִּ֑י <S%H854><s%> for פֶּ֚ן <S%H6435><s%> fear אֶרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> [be] not with me? lest peradventure I see בָרָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that יִמְצָ֖א <S%H4672><s%> that shall come on אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> my father
